text: The Galliano Pontoon Bridge crosses Bayou Lafourche in the town of Galliano, Louisiana. Built in 1956, and rehabilitated in 2009, this pontoon swing bridge has a total length of 136.2 feet with its largest span at 71.9 feet. The bridge deck is 24.9 feet wide.https://bridgehunter.com/la/lafourche/galliano- pontoon/ ==References== Category:Road bridges in Louisiana Category:Pontoon bridges in the United States Category:Swing bridges in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Lafourche Parish, Louisiana Category:1956 establishments in Louisiana Category:Bridges completed in 1956
title: Galliano Pontoon Bridge
